slidePuzzle

Interface Tile


  • public interface Tile
    Tile represents a spatial unit on the sliding puzzle. Tiles can be merged, rotated, split and swapped.
    Author:
    Hindes, Kelley, Pohl, Weiss

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isLeaf()
      Returns a boolean value based on data type
      slidePuzzle.LeafTile merge(slidePuzzle.InternalTile parent, slidePuzzle.InternalTile grandparent, slidePuzzle.LeafTile l)
      Merges four sibling tiles into a single tile.
      Tile rotate(slidePuzzle.InternalTile parent, int location)
      Rotates four sibling tiles 180 degrees.
      slidePuzzle.InternalTile split(slidePuzzle.InternalTile parent)
      Split divides tile into four leaf tiles.
      slidePuzzle.LeafTile swap(java.lang.String s, Tile root)
      Swap exchanges the location of the tile with an adjacent tile.

    • Method Detail

      • merge

        slidePuzzle.LeafTile merge(slidePuzzle.InternalTile parent,
                           slidePuzzle.InternalTile grandparent,
                           slidePuzzle.LeafTile l)
        Merges four sibling tiles into a single tile. If merge() is called on an internal tile, a leaf tile of the same depth and location is returned. If merge() is called on a leaf tile, the parent internal tile of the four sibling tiles becomes a leaf tile and that leaf tile is returned. Merge will not be performed if current depth greater than or equal to maxDepth. This error checking is done in main method.
        Parameters:
        parent - of leaf tile on which method is called
        grandparent - of leaf tile on which method is called
        l - - leaf tile on which method is called
        Returns:
        new leaf tile created by merging

      • rotate

        Tile rotate(slidePuzzle.InternalTile parent,
            int location)
        Rotates four sibling tiles 180 degrees.
        Parameters:
        parent - of tile on which method is called
        location - of tile on which method is called
        Returns:
        the tile on which rotate is called in new rotated position

      • split

        slidePuzzle.InternalTile split(slidePuzzle.InternalTile parent)
        Split divides tile into four leaf tiles. If an internal tile is split, that internal tile is returned. If a leaf tile is split, the internal tile that is parent of the new leaf tiles is returned. Split will not be performed if current depth less than or equal to minDepth. Error checking will be done in main method.
        Parameters:
        parent - of tile to split
        Returns:
        Parent of new four leaves

      • swap

        slidePuzzle.LeafTile swap(java.lang.String s,
                          Tile root)
        Swap exchanges the location of the tile with an adjacent tile. The two tiles may or may not have a common parent, however they must be adjacent spatially and must have the same depth.
        Parameters:
        s - String command for direction of swap
        root - - root of quadtree
        Returns:
        leafTile in its swapped position

      • isLeaf

        boolean isLeaf()
        Returns a boolean value based on data type
        Returns:
        true if tile is a LeafTile and false if tile is an InternalTile
